title: Lalola
overview: Lalo's life changes after breaking Romina's heart and waking up as Lola. She must learn to be a woman with all her disadvantages in a macho world as she seeks to reverse the spell.As revealed at the end of season 1, Lola is pregnant. As season 2 begins, we try to find out how this happened. We learn about her attempts to find true love, which man or woman she was involved with, how she tried to bribe Circe to break the curse, if only for 24 hours, and everything she did to undo the spell.
